channel.title: State of the Ecosystem 2018-2019
channel.description: Recent content on State of the Ecosystem 2018-2019

item.title: Environmental
item.description: Introduction Data sets Surface winds Slopewater proportions Ocean temperature anomaly (in situ) Ocean temperature (OI) Ocean salinity anomaly (in situ) Ocean salinity (OI) Stratification EcoMon nutrient data North Atlantic Oscillation (NAO) Synthesis Visualize Series & Build Correlation Matrices Introduction The purpose of this report is to document State of the Ecosystem (SOE) indicator data processing. All R code used to process and visualize the following data sets is self-contained in the Rmarkdown document associated with this HTML file.

item.title: Lower Trophic Levels
item.description: Introduction EcoMon zooplankton data (OI) EcoMon nutrient data Introduction The purpose of this report is to document State of the Ecosystem (SOE) lower trophic level indicator data processing. All R code used to process and visualize the following data sets is self-contained in the Rmarkdown document associated with this HTML file. To run and update data sets in this document, set the save_clean parameter in the set-up chunk to TRUE.
